formattedAddress: 369 Lexington Ave 3rd floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 369 Lexington Ave 3rd floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
I want to send a note of thanks for the service provided by Carolina and her team. She was very accommodating, arranging for multiple site visits for our daughter as she selected the ideal site to celebrate her special occasion. Carolina even made herself available the day before the event such that we could all see the space and plan for the setup to best host our guests.

The day of the party, Carolina was present, actively ensuring the space was comfortable for our guests in spite of the rain. She provided exceptional service, including placing large blue dots on the floor to guide guests to the rooftop! EVERYONE was profusely complimentary about the space, the chic ambience, location, the friendly staff, and service, with security even covering guests with an umbrella as they walked to the bar.

Your team and event space made the occasion fun, distinctive and memorable. Commendations to Carolina. Thank you for working with us and feel free to use me as a reerence, should you need one.

With appreciation

originalText.text: Jay Suites on Lex and 41 is amazing. I have used twice within the last two months (I live in FL, own my own business, and come to NYC to meet with team members and customers) and have found a terrific venue that I will use over and over. Very happy with Jay Suites!

text.text: Jay Suites on Lex and 41 is amazing. I have used twice within the last two months (I live in FL, own my own business, and come to NYC to meet with team members and customers) and have found a terrific venue that I will use over and over. Very happy with Jay Suites!

originalText.text: Great experience overall using this space for my senior leadership team. The room was spacious and had all of the amenities needed for our team members who could not make it in, to join virtually. We booked for two days and there was always someone onsite to coordinate our needs. They were even able to coordinate our last minute request for a small break-out room for my president to take a private meeting. We will definitely be using this space again.

originalText.text:
We booked the 3rd Floor Conference Room at 369 Lexington Avenue on 12/7/22 for a full-day seminar.

This was a great experience.  Joan Torrente was amazing and super helpful through the entire process.  She went above and beyond to ensure that our guests felt welcomed. She was very responsive and it felt like we had another Team Member on our Staff  What a gift she is!  The space was also very nice and well maintained.  Everyone felt very comfortable being together again for the first time since March 2020!

Dr. Karen Dubin
Chief Operating Officer
SWEET Institute
